channel.title: Food Recall News
channel.description: Stay updated with the latest food safety alerts and recalls!

item.title: Savencia Cheese USA Announces an Expanded Voluntary Recall of Select Soft Ripened Cheeses
item.description: Savencia Cheese USA has expanded its voluntary recall of certain soft-ripened cheeses due to possible Listeria monocytogenes contamination. For more details, read the full recall notice.
